titles.title: Clean Grain Act of 1988

A bill to authorize and direct the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a schedule of premiums for exceptionally clean, high quality grain forfeited to the Commodity Credit Corporation, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 2/9/1988--Introduced. Clean Grain Act of 1988 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a schedule of Commodity Credit Corporation (CCC) grain quality premiums and discounts. Sets forth certain quality criteria. States that payment shall be made by: (1) payment-in-kind certificates; or (2) reduction of specified grain forfeitures on CCC loans.
